meanings.definition: A man employed to do housework.
meanings.sent1: The houseman cleaned the floors and washed the dishes.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor hired a houseman to help with household chores.
meanings.sent3: The houseman accidentally vacuumed up a sock along with the dust bunnies.
meanings.sent4: The houseman's efficiency in tidying up the rooms was like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: I always remember the houseman by his trusty mop and bucket.

meanings.definition: A male medical student or intern living in a hospital dormitory.
meanings.sent1: The houseman assisted the doctors in the hospital.
meanings.sent2: As a houseman, he learned a lot during his medical training.
meanings.sent3: The houseman joked that he lived in the hospital more than at home.
meanings.sent4: The houseman's dedication to his patients was like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The hospital buzzed with activity, with the houseman at the center of it all.
